description:
Stop choosing between the "built for dudes" version of a ski, or the "overcooked noodle" option that doesn't have the right flex and balance for women. Coalition Snow made a ski that's amazing for female shredders. The SOS is a one-quiver-ski that floats on powder days and holds an edge when playing on the resort runs. The full birch wood core adds dampness, provides a solid flex and holds up well in all the chopped and glopped conditions you might encounter.

  • Slanted ABS sidewalls reduce the swing weight for manoevrability
  • Triaxial fibreglass offers a good balance of flex and torsional control
  • Full birch wood core absorbs vibration and provides solid flex at high speed
  • Sandwich construction brings playful energy and rebound
  • 3 point sidecut creates a ski that feels shorter than it is on hardpack
  • Early rise in the tip and tail improves floatation and offers easy turn initiation
  • Traditional camber underfoot for powerful, confidence inspiring turns on boilerplate
  • Sintered 7500 base has great wax retention for a fast ride
name: Coalition Snow SOS All Mountain Ski - Women's
